_header: Bought and sold full traitorously / And to a pillar bound
Subjects: Passion, carols of; Virgin Mary, sorrows of; carols, of the Passio
_description: A Song of the Passion — five quatrains (abab) and burden (cc): ‘To see the mayden wepe her sones passion / It entrid my hart full depe with gret compassion’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Bowght & sold full traytorslyAnd to a pylar
                    bownde…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…þat we may be in ioy with theTher þat thy swet son
                    ysExplicit
